long_description: Wall map of Montana features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief. Topographic map, 1:600,000 scale, contour intervals are 500 feet, and in color to easily notice difference in elevations. Raven Maps and Images; copyright 1987. Measures 65 x 41 inches. Although there is amazing detail, the map remains completely uncluttered when viewed from more than a few feet away. Whether displayed in a home, school or office, these maps are sure to attract attention; the perfect gift.
short_description: Wall map of Montana features gradation coloring representing changes in altitude and three-dimensional shading for relief.
